paper_abstract: In this article, the design, fabrication, and testing of a wide band single-ended power amplifier (PA) using GaN field effect transistors (FETs) are reported. The single-ended amplifier demonstrates a bandwidth larger than 30% around 2 GHz, with a high gain, PAE, and output power combination. (C) 2008 Wiley Periodicals. Inc. Int J RF and Microwave CAE 18: 936-542. 2008.
paper_title: Wide-Band Hybrid Power Amplifier Design Using GaN FETs
